title: Worlds missions ? is it bugged?
body:
I recently bought the worlds missions completed them now I only have 1 mission,

that mission reads

Complete 4 worlds missions.
I have completed 3 out of 4 
But I have no other missions to complete.

is this a bug or will I get more later on?

Thanks guys and gals in advance I know your busy with preseason, keep up the good work.

replies.body: You'll be getting more missions later on this week as Worlds progresses!
Yes, there will be more missions soon. Just wait! As we get further into Worlds, more missions will come with it.
